data.eml:eml: A giant foraminifer that converges to the feeding strategy of carnivorous sponges: Spiculosiphon oceana sp. nov. (Foraminifera, Astrorhizida)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maldonado, Manuel, López-Acosta, María, Sitjà, Cèlia, Aguilar, Ricardo, García, Silvia, Vacelet, Jean (2013): A giant foraminifer that converges to the feeding strategy of carnivorous sponges: Spiculosiphon oceana sp. nov. (Foraminifera, Astrorhizida). Zootaxa 3669 (4): 571-584, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3669.4.9
